STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Your Digital Kitchen for Building Delicious Dishes
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay In The Loop On Food Innovation
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Don't just take our word for it - see what others have to say about our food building app!
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized how I create new recipes. The ability to virtually construct dishes before actually cooking them is a game-changer.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a busy parent, I love how this app lets me design nutritious kid-friendly meals with just a few taps. It's become an invaluable meal-planning tool.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Whether I'm meal prepping for the week or just want to try something new, this app makes building unique food combinations easy and fun.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Answers to your questions about our food building app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to design and build custom dishes by combining various ingredients in unique ways. It's a fun and creative platform for building your own culinary creations.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: You can browse through our extensive database of ingredients and drag-and-drop them onto a virtual plate. Adjust quantities, explore flavor combinations, and get nutritional information on your custom dish.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, the basic app is free to download and use. We offer optional premium features like advanced recipe tools and meal planning for a small subscription fee.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Absolutely! You can share photos and details of your custom dish creations on our social platform. Get feedback, find inspiration, and connect with other food lovers.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, our food building app is available for both iOS and Android devices. The mobile version has the same great features optimized for on-the-go use.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Discover recipes, plan meals, and simplify cooking with our intuitive app.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Revolutionizing the way you create culinary masterpieces.
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Craft mouthwatering recipes with our intuitive app. Explore ingredients, techniques, and flavors like never before.

STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Unleash your culinary creativity with FoodCraft. Design delectable dishes, share recipes, and explore a world of flavors. Cook up something extraordinary!
FEATURE_1_BODY: Our app makes it easy to construct delicious recipes with a user-friendly interface for adding ingredients and step-by-step instructions.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Access a massive library of ingredients from around the world, complete with nutritional information and suggested substitutions.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Automatically generate shopping lists based on your planned recipes, eliminating guesswork and reducing food waste.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Easily find recipes that fit your lifestyle by filtering for vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, low-carb, and other dietary needs.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Share your culinary creations with friends and family, get feedback, and discover new recipes from our vibrant community.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Level up your skills with our library of cooking tutorials, pro tips, and technique videos from renowned chefs.
CTA_BODY: Discover an app that simplifies meal planning and preparation. With our intuitive interface and comprehensive recipe database, creating mouthwatering dishes has never been easier.
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Explore, Plan, and Cook Like a Pro
HERO_SUBTITLE: Your digital kitchen for culinary creativity
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Have a question or need assistance with our food building app? Fill out the form below.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: All the tools you need to slice, dice and stir
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Look the part of a professional chef
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Keep your clothes clean while cooking
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Protect your hands from hot surfaces
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: FoodBuilder is an innovative app that allows you to design and create your own custom food items from scratch. With a user-friendly interface and a vast selection of ingredients, you can craft unique dishes tailored to your taste preferences.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: FoodBuilder provides a step-by-step process to build your food creations. First, you choose a base item like bread, pasta, or a protein. Then, you can add various toppings, sauces, seasonings, and other ingredients to create your masterpiece. The app generates a visual representation of your creation as you go.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I save my recipes in FoodBuilder?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! FoodBuilder allows you to save all your custom creations in your personal recipe book. You can access your saved recipes anytime, making it easy to recreate your favorite dishes or share them with friends and family.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is FoodBuilder suitable for different dietary preferences?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, FoodBuilder caters to various dietary needs and preferences. You can filter ingredients based on dietary restrictions, such as vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, or nut-free options. This ensures that your custom creations align with your dietary requirements.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our app takes the guesswork out of meal prep by creating customized meal plans tailored to your dietary preferences and goals.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Follow easy-to-follow recipes with video tutorials from expert chefs, making cooking a breeze for any skill level.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Automatically generate a shopping list based on your meal plan, streamlining your grocery trips and reducing food waste.
